page.title: 05NOMANSLAND 1985 CONT
page.content: On Tuesdays there is a children's youth club from six o'clock till a quarter past seven.At the youth club they play games and go outside.It is a friendly place and new people are always welcome.A lady called Mrs Watts runs it with her helper Mrs Robertson. The hall room for the church has stained glass windows .There the First Bramshaw Brownies Pack is held in the old school room.They go to chapel parades once a month.They attend regulary.The school room has just been refloored with concrete . There are stone blocks put in the walls of the chapel outside with all different names on them.It has a notice board outside.
